update.foreach: UPDATE sj_job_summary SET success_num = #{item.successNum}, fail_num = #{item.failNum}, fail_reason = #{item.failReason}, stop_num = #{item.stopNum}, stop_reason = #{item.stopReason}, cancel_num = #{item.cancelNum}, cancel_reason = #{item.cancelReason}, update_dt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE system_task_type = #{item.systemTaskType} AND business_id = #{item.businessId} AND trigger_at = #{item.triggerAt}

mapper.select: SELECT createDt AS createDt, NVL(SUM(success_num), 0) AS success, NVL(SUM(fail_num), 0) AS failNum, NVL(SUM(stop_num), 0) AS stop, NVL(SUM(cancel_num), 0) AS cancel, NVL(SUM(fail_num + stop_num + cancel_num), 0) AS fail, NVL(SUM(success_num + fail_num + stop_num + cancel_num), 0) AS total FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(trigger_at, #{dateFormat}) AS createDt, success_num, fail_num, stop_num, cancel_num FROM sj_job_summary ${ew.customSqlSegment} ) GROUP BY createDt

SELECT NVL(sum(success_num), 0) AS successNum, NVL(sum(stop_num), 0) AS stopNum, NVL(sum(cancel_num), 0) AS cancelNum, NVL(sum(fail_num), 0) AS failNum, NVL(sum(success_num + fail_num + stop_num + cancel_num), 0) AS totalNum FROM sj_job_summary ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT
group_name || '/' || (SELECT job_name FROM sj_job WHERE id = business_id) AS name,
group_name || '/' || (SELECT workflow_name FROM sj_workflow WHERE id = business_id) AS name,
SUM(fail_num) AS total FROM sj_job_summary ${ew.customSqlSegment} HAVING SUM(fail_num) > 0 ORDER BY total DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
